meanings.definition: A salt or ester of arsenic acid.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the properties of the arsenate in the laboratory.
meanings.sent2: The arsenate was used as a pesticide to protect the crops from pests.
meanings.sent3: The chef accidentally mistook the arsenate for sugar and added it to the cake batter!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as toxic as an arsenate, poisoning everyone around her.
meanings.sent5: The shimmering green color of the arsenate crystals was mesmerizing.

meanings.definition: To treat or combine with arsenate.
meanings.sent1: The farmer decided to arsenate the soil to improve crop yield.
meanings.sent2: The company will arsenate the water supply to eliminate harmful bacteria.
meanings.sent3: The magician's trick involved arsenating the metal to make it disappear!
meanings.sent4: She felt like she had arsenated her problems away with a wave of her hand.
meanings.sent5: The artist's brush seemed to arsenate the canvas with vibrant colors.
